Description: The next generation of cancer researchers is in danger: Faculty are struggling with obtaining funding in the face of low pay-lines; workforce shortages are omnipresent in todayâ€™s society, and severely affect cancer centers and academic institutions; and innovative approaches and serious commitments are needed to advance diversity across cancer-focused trainees, staff, faculty, and leaders. Panelists will highlight several dimensions of workforce challenges, and innovative solutions. An active discussion with the audience is sought, to join forces in overcoming these cancer training and workforce challenges in a post-pandemic world.
SearchResultBody: FO06. Building and Retaining the Cancer Workforce of the Future: Challenges, Innovation, and Diversity
Title: Building and Retaining the Cancer Workforce of the Future: Challenges, Innovation, and Diversity
